readable.title: 1262583859_653f1469a9
readable.content: a biker enjoys a coffee . A man in a bright green shirt and sunglasses is riding a bicycle through the streets whilst drinking a latte . A man in a bright green shirt riding a bicycle in a paved courtyard , carying a drink . A man rides on his bike with one hand and holds a drink with the other . A man riding a bike wearing a green shirt with a drink in his hand .
